mapper.select: select distinct t1.id, t1.code, t1.name, t1.description, t1.uri, t1.parent_id as parentId, t1.virtual, t1.hierarchy, t1.status, t1.create_time as createTime, t1.create_user_id as createUserId, t1.modify_time as modifyTime, t1.modify_user_id as modifyUserId, t1.deleted, t1.icon from t_scd_func t1 left join t_scd_role_func t2 on t1.id = t2.func_id left join t_scd_role t3 on t3.id = t2.role_id where t1.status = 1 and t1.deleted = 0 and t3.status = 1 and t3.deleted = 0 and t3.id in #{roleId}
